Articles.Content:
Hey ladies and gentlemen and other forms of life, Im Darenton2k7 or 'Shadow' to whoever knows me, Im 19 i live in scotland and im an alcoholic ... wait wrong forum, programmer bla bla bla....

Peace
Welcome darenton, You\'ll need a sense of humour here so you\'ll fit in fine. It\'s a great game too.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

> and other forms of life

Wassup? Well, what\'s up is my rocket that\'s bigger than yours =P

pssh sounds more like wishful thinking
Well my explosions are Bigger than yours. (probably)
